eah.name: Eah
eah.shortDescription: Eah talk not much. Job done fast.

shadow.name: Shadow
shadow.shortDescription: Me and my loyal familiar will do any job for you, from guarding to murder... for a fair price of course.

miaxi.name: Miaxi
miaxi.shortDescription: I'd gladly help you solve your issues.

ako.name: Ako
ako.shortDescription: I will do anything no questions asked, as long as you support my researches.
